title: MD
biography: K. S. R. Murthy was a member of the 11th Lok Sabha of India. He represented the Amalapuram constituency of Andhra Pradesh and was a member of the Indian National Congress. He was in Prajarajyam party for some time and later resigned from the Party to join congress again. Prior to entering politics he served in Indian Administrative Service and rose to the level of secretary to Government of India.
aiSummary: K. R. S. Murthy is a cardiac intervention specialist with an H-index of 28 at Cardiology (Member). Has been published in New England Journal of Medicine, JAMA Pediatrics, The Lancet Haematology. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
